block.name: Python Message Interface
block.doc:
Message bridge between the flowgraph and the controlling python script.
This block uses an internal python Queue to hold incoming messages. In order to empty the queue, call the get_message() function from the python flowgraph script.
Inputs: msg_in: message input
Outputs: msg_out: message output
Internal Functions: flush_messages(): empty the queue get_message(timeout): get the next message from the queue (optionally specify timeout in seconds, otherwise it will block) send_message(message): send the given message on the msg_out port
